lock.py¶

GET /locks¶

get locks for a given rse.

Example request:

GET /locks HTTP/1.1

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: 'application/x-json-stream'
Status Codes:
  • 500 Internal Server Error – e.__class__.__name__: e.args[0]
GET /locks¶

get locks for a given scope, name.

Example request:

GET /locks HTTP/1.1

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: 'application/x-json-stream'
Status Codes:
  • 500 Internal Server Error – e.__class__.__name__: e.args[0]
